dc_description_s: The City Arts Projects (CAP) grant provides project support for individuals and organizations to execute projects that promote arts and humanities activities to a diverse range of communities within the District of Columbia. The DCCAH highly encourages small Also Artistic projects may include City Arts Projects will be reviewed by cohorts based on the project s artistic expense budget and projects produced by individuals or organizations.The DC Commission on the Arts and Humanities recognizes the importance of remaining relevant in a city of competitive opportunities for residents who have at their disposal significant discretionary income for arts and cultural offerings. Further1 billion in economic activity is generated annually by the non-profit arts and culture industry in Washington Additionally These trends create an opportunity for DCCAH to position itself at the forefront of the city s cultural planning.
